page.title: 18A Usual Day
page.content: Today was Friday 12th July 1985 and an ordinary day at school - only 1 week to go before we break up for the school holidays - I am looking forward to it because I am going on a canal boat for a week. It was the usual day at school today, I got to aschool at 8.45 am. and Mrs Kiln called us in at 5 minutes to 9. We had Assembly with Mr Barratt who talked about Sports Day which is next Monday. I am going to be in the Relay race. After Assembly we did some Maths and English and after Break we had Physical Education. Then Mrs Elliott read us a story about a sheep getting stuck and a shepherd rescuing it. Then it was lunch time. After lunch we worked on our Sheep project - I am doing some weaving from some wool I have spun.Then I went home and played.
